name: Tamil Nadu People Welfare Association
briefDescription: TAPWA endures  to serve the marginalized people especially formation of women self help groups (334 SHGs 4000 members), creating and providing self-employment opportunities for the women SHGs (637 numbers), establishing linkage between women SHGs and financial institutions for sustainablity (715 numbers), providing free shelter for homeless (50 women), orphange for children (30 numbers), education (445 children), implementing awareness generation trainings (8000 women, farmers, public) emergency relief (944 victims of Tsunami and fire accident) etc.
